trans-unit.source: Tooling to help you on the process
trans-unit.target: Tooling to help you on the process

trans-unit.source: Tooling to help you on the process
trans-unit.target: Tooling to help you on the process

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: The .NET Portability Analyzer
trans-unit.target: The .NET Portability Analyzer

trans-unit.source: Want to make your libraries multi-platform?
trans-unit.target: Want to make your libraries multi-platform?

trans-unit.source: Want to see how much work is required to make your application compatible with other .NET platforms?
trans-unit.target: Want to see how much work is required to make your application compatible with other .NET platforms?

trans-unit.source: The [.NET Portability Analyzer](https://visualstudiogallery.msdn.microsoft.com/1177943e-cfb7-4822-a8a6-e56c7905292b) is a tool that provides you with a detailed report on how flexible your program is across .NET platforms by analyzing assemblies.
trans-unit.target: The [.NET Portability Analyzer](https://visualstudiogallery.msdn.microsoft.com/1177943e-cfb7-4822-a8a6-e56c7905292b) is a tool that provides you with a detailed report on how flexible your program is across .NET platforms by analyzing assemblies.

trans-unit.source: The Portability Analyzer is offered as a Visual Studio Extension and as a console app.
trans-unit.target: The Portability Analyzer is offered as a Visual Studio Extension and as a console app.

trans-unit.source: New Targets
trans-unit.target: New Targets

trans-unit.source: [.NET Core](https://www.dotnetfoundation.org/netcore): Has a modular design, employs side-by-side, and targets cross-platform scenarios.
trans-unit.target: [.NET Core](https://www.dotnetfoundation.org/netcore): Has a modular design, employs side-by-side, and targets cross-platform scenarios.

trans-unit.source: Side-by-side allows you to adopt new .NET Core versions without breaking other apps.
trans-unit.target: Side-by-side allows you to adopt new .NET Core versions without breaking other apps.

trans-unit.source: [ASP.NET Core](https://www.dotnetfoundation.org/aspnet-core): is a modern web-framework built on .NET Core thus giving developers the same benefits.
trans-unit.target: [ASP.NET Core](https://www.dotnetfoundation.org/aspnet-core): is a modern web-framework built on .NET Core thus giving developers the same benefits.

trans-unit.source: [.NET Native](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/dotnet/2014/04/24/net-native-performance): Improve performance of your Windows Store apps that run on x64 and ARM machines by using .NET Native’s static compilation.
trans-unit.target: [.NET Native](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/dotnet/2014/04/24/net-native-performance): Improve performance of your Windows Store apps that run on x64 and ARM machines by using .NET Native’s static compilation.

trans-unit.source: How to Use Portability Analyzer
trans-unit.target: How to Use Portability Analyzer

trans-unit.source: To begin using the .NET Portability Analyzer, download the extension from the Visual Studio Gallery.
trans-unit.target: To begin using the .NET Portability Analyzer, download the extension from the Visual Studio Gallery.

trans-unit.source: You can configure it in Visual Studio via **Tools > Options > .NET Portability Analyzer** and select your Target Platforms.
trans-unit.target: You can configure it in Visual Studio via **Tools > Options > .NET Portability Analyzer** and select your Target Platforms.

trans-unit.source: For now, use ASP.NET Core as a proxy for all .NET Core-based platforms (for example, [Windows 10 .NET UAP apps](http://blogs.windows.com/buildingapps/2015/03/02/a-first-look-at-the-windows-10-universal-app-platform/)).
trans-unit.target: For now, use ASP.NET Core as a proxy for all .NET Core-based platforms (for example, [Windows 10 .NET UAP apps](http://blogs.windows.com/buildingapps/2015/03/02/a-first-look-at-the-windows-10-universal-app-platform/)).

trans-unit.source: Portability screenshot
trans-unit.target: Portability screenshot

trans-unit.source: To analyze your entire project, right-click on your project in **Solution Explorer** and select **Analyze > Analyze Assembly Portability**.
trans-unit.target: To analyze your entire project, right-click on your project in **Solution Explorer** and select **Analyze > Analyze Assembly Portability**.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, go to the **Analyze** menu and select **Analyze Assembly Portability**.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, go to the **Analyze** menu and select **Analyze Assembly Portability**.

trans-unit.source: From there, select your project’s executable or .dll.
trans-unit.target: From there, select your project’s executable or .dll.

trans-unit.source: Portability Solution Explorer
trans-unit.target: Portability Solution Explorer

trans-unit.source: After running the analysis, you will see your .NET Portability Report.
trans-unit.target: After running the analysis, you will see your .NET Portability Report.

trans-unit.source: Only types that are unsupported by a target platform will appear in the list and you can review recommendations in the **Messages** tab in the **Error List**.
trans-unit.target: Only types that are unsupported by a target platform will appear in the list and you can review recommendations in the **Messages** tab in the **Error List**.

trans-unit.source: You can also jump to problem areas directly from the **Messages** tab.
trans-unit.target: You can also jump to problem areas directly from the **Messages** tab.

trans-unit.source: Portability Report
trans-unit.target: Portability Report

trans-unit.source: Don’t want to use Visual Studio?
trans-unit.target: Don’t want to use Visual Studio?

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Portability Analyzer from the Command Prompt.
trans-unit.target: You can also use the Portability Analyzer from the Command Prompt.

trans-unit.source: Download the command-line analyzer [here](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=42678).
trans-unit.target: Download the command-line analyzer [here](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=42678).

trans-unit.source: Type the following command to analyze the current directory:
trans-unit.target: Type the following command to analyze the current directory:

trans-unit.source: To analyze a specific list of .dll files, type the following command:
trans-unit.target: To analyze a specific list of .dll files, type the following command:

trans-unit.source: Your .NET Portability Report will be saved as an Excel *.xlsx* file in your current directory.
trans-unit.target: Your .NET Portability Report will be saved as an Excel *.xlsx* file in your current directory.

trans-unit.source: The **Details** tab in the Excel Workbook will contain more info.
trans-unit.target: The **Details** tab in the Excel Workbook will contain more info.

trans-unit.source: For more info on the .NET Portability Analyzer, read [this article](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/dotnet/archive/2014/08/06/leveraging-existing-code-across-net-platforms.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more info on the .NET Portability Analyzer, read [this article](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/dotnet/archive/2014/08/06/leveraging-existing-code-across-net-platforms.aspx).
